text: I'm going to show you a picture. And I want you to look at the picture. I want you to tell me everything that you see happening in the picture. Just tell me everything that you see going on. Now, there's the picture. Look down here, Mr. Toopy. Let's see, part of the old kitchen. Is that an old kitchen or isn't it? Ah... Okay, a lady . in . my other kitchen. In her kitchen. . I need some work, I suppose. .. And we have . another woman there sharing her pleasures or whatever. Okay, there it is. . Have you heard of that game they . started to play after Christmas? . Yes, you were telling me about that Mr. Doopey. Trivia Pursuit. Just tell me, do you see anything else happening in this picture here? What else do you see happening? What's going on there? Well, it looks like... . I'd say this is... . See what it looks like. . Ahh... Bum-buddy, bum-buddy, boo-booby-boo. My mother will beat me by a... My wife will beat me by a... Couple of rows of this. What's happening over here, Mr. Chilby? That's like the... What's the machine here? Let me see. Oh, that's the sun from home from school maybe or something? Mm-hmm. That's the youngster there. What's going on here? Well, it's just as though they're . getting ready to go to school or they're just coming home from school. Okay. And what's happening here? Right there is the same as back there except for down here in the bottom I think it's... Uh... That's a little separate. .
